name: WW2 Warbirds
description:
"WW2 Warbirds" is an arcade flying shooter.

You can choose to fight for the Allies or for the Axis with their best Warbirds.
Join the force and destroy waves of enemy fighters to become the master of the sky.

Stay tuned, more features will be added to the game in future versions.
If you have suggestions or feedback, we would like to hear from you.

Have fun :)
